name: Analistica Academy
description:
Analistica Academy features heavily raunchy humor which may be unsuitable for some audiences.
Hora Machia, the Alpha male and the only male living in Ragonia is an arrogant, vindictive and snide fellow who basks in the attention any man would desire for - being one of the few men alive after a worldwide epidemic that reduced the world's population.
In this tale, Hora must deal with two obstacles barring him from dominating all of Ragonia. His archenemy approaching with an army and the three legendary girls of Analistica Academy. Can Hora win a war on two sides?
Inspired by anime such as "Seitokai Yakuindomo", Analistica Academy is a raunchy visual novel comedy which prides itself on parodying tropes commonly found in both "chuuni" and "ero" style games, and placing its own twists on them. What secrets does the world of Ragonia hold?
4 Different Heroines
4-6 Hours Long
19+ CGs
HD Art
